org.apache.flink.graph.spargel

类 ScatterFunction<K,VV,Message,EV>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.graph.spargel.ScatterFunction<K,VV,Message,EV>
  • 类型参数:
    K - The type of the vertex key (the vertex identifier).
    VV - The type of the vertex value (the state of the vertex).
    Message - The type of the message sent between vertices along the edges.
    EV - The type of the values that are associated with the edges.
    所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    CommunityDetection.LabelMessenger, ConnectedComponents.CCMessenger, IncrementalSSSP.InvalidateMessenger, LabelPropagation.SendNewLabelToNeighbors, PageRank.RankMessenger, SingleSourceShortestPaths.MinDistanceMessenger, SingleSourceShortestPaths.MinDistanceMessenger

    public abstract class ScatterFunction<K,VV,Message,EV>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The base class for functions that produce messages between vertices as a part of a ScatterGatherIteration.
    另请参阅:

        public ScatterFunction()

    • 方法详细资料

      • getNumberOfVertices

        public long getNumberOfVertices()
        Retrieves the number of vertices in the graph.
        返回:
        the number of vertices if the IterationConfiguration.setOptNumVertices(boolean) option has been set; -1 otherwise.

      • setNumberOfVertices

        void setNumberOfVertices(long numberOfVertices)

      • getDirection

        public EdgeDirection getDirection()
        Retrieves the edge direction in which messages are propagated in the scatter-gather iteration.
        返回:
        the messaging EdgeDirection

      • setDirection

        void setDirection(EdgeDirection direction)

      • sendMessages

        public abstract void sendMessages(Vertex<K,VV> vertex)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is invoked once per superstep for each vertex that was changed in that superstep. It needs to produce the messages that will be received by vertices in the next superstep.
        参数:
        vertex - The vertex that was changed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - The computation may throw exceptions, which causes the superstep to fail.

      • preSuperstep

        public void preSuperstep()
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is executed once per superstep before the scatter function is invoked for each vertex.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Exceptions in the pre-superstep phase cause the superstep to fail.

      • postSuperstep

        public void postSuperstep()
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is executed once per superstep after the scatter function has been invoked for each vertex.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Exceptions in the post-superstep phase cause the superstep to fail.

      • getEdges

        public java.lang.Iterable<Edge<K,EV>> getEdges()
        Gets an Iterable with all edges. This method is mutually exclusive with sendMessageToAllNeighbors(Object) and may be called only once.

        If the EdgeDirection is OUT (default), then this iterator contains outgoing edges.

        If the EdgeDirection is IN, then this iterator contains incoming edges.

        If the EdgeDirection is ALL, then this iterator contains both outgoing and incoming edges.

        返回:
        An iterator with all edges.

      • sendMessageToAllNeighbors

        public void sendMessageToAllNeighbors(Message m)
        Sends the given message to all vertices that are targets of an edge of the changed vertex. This method is mutually exclusive to the method getEdges() and may be called only once.

        If the EdgeDirection is OUT (default), the message will be sent to out-neighbors.

        If the EdgeDirection is IN, the message will be sent to in-neighbors.

        If the EdgeDirection is ALL, the message will be sent to all neighbors.

        参数:
        m - The message to send.

      • sendMessageTo

        public void sendMessageTo(K target,
                          Message m)
        Sends the given message to the vertex identified by the given key. If the target vertex does not exist, the next superstep will cause an exception due to a non-deliverable message.
        参数:
        target - The key (id) of the target vertex to message.
        m - The message.

      • getSuperstepNumber

        public int getSuperstepNumber()
        Gets the number of the superstep, starting at 1.
        返回:
        The number of the current superstep.

      • getIterationAggregator

        public <T extends Aggregator<?>> T getIterationAggregator(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the iteration aggregator registered under the given name. The iteration aggregator combines all aggregates globally once per superstep and makes them available in the next superstep.
        参数:
        name - The name of the aggregator.
        返回:
        The aggregator registered under this name, or null, if no aggregator was registered.

      • getPreviousIterationAggregate

        public <T extends Value> T getPreviousIterationAggregate(java.lang.String name)
        Get the aggregated value that an aggregator computed in the previous iteration.
        参数:
        name - The name of the aggregator.
        返回:
        The aggregated value of the previous iteration.

      • getBroadcastSet

        public <T> java.util.Collection<T> getBroadcastSet(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the broadcast data set registered under the given name. Broadcast data sets are available on all parallel instances of a function. They can be registered via ScatterGatherConfiguration.addBroadcastSetForScatterFunction(String, org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet).
        参数:
        name - The name under which the broadcast set is registered.
        返回:
        The broadcast data set.

      • init

        void init(IterationRuntimeContext context)

      • set

        void set(java.util.Iterator<?> edges,
         Collector<Tuple2<K,Message>> out,
         K id)

      • getInDegree

        public long getInDegree()
        Retrieves the vertex in-degree (number of in-coming edges).
        返回:
        The in-degree of this vertex

      • setInDegree

        void setInDegree(long inDegree)

      • getOutDegree

        public long getOutDegree()
        Retrieve the vertex out-degree (number of out-going edges).
        返回:
        The out-degree of this vertex

      • setOutDegree

        void setOutDegree(long outDegree)
